trans-unit.source: Derivative of <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that is the base class for all activities that contain other activities.
trans-unit.target: Derivativo di <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> che è la classe base per tutte le attività contenenti altre attività.

trans-unit.source: A CompositeActivity is responsible for managing the execution of its child activities.
trans-unit.target: Una CompositeActivity è responsabile per la gestione dell'esecuzione delle relative attività figlio.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] A CompositeActivity manages the execution of its child activities using <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext> class methods and events defined on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> class.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Una CompositeActivity gestisce l'esecuzione di attività figlio utilizzando <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext>metodi della classe e gli eventi definiti nella <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>classe.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext>

trans-unit.source: For example, a child activity is scheduled for execution using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.ExecuteActivity%2A> of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext>.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, un'attività figlio è pianificata per l'esecuzione usando <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.ExecuteActivity%2A> <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.ExecuteActivity%2A>

trans-unit.source: A CompositeActivity activity can be notified when a child activity completes its execution by subscribing to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Closed> event defined on <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>.
trans-unit.target: Un'attività CompositeActivity può ricevere notifiche quando un'attività figlio completa l'esecuzione per la sottoscrizione all' <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Closed>evento definito in <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Closed>

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime enforces certain constraints on CompositeActivity execution, the most fundamental of which is that a CompositeActivity activity cannot move to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Closed> state if any child activities are still in a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Executing>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Canceling>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Compensating>, or <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Faulting>, state.
trans-unit.target: Il runtime del flusso di lavoro applica alcuni vincoli sull'esecuzione di CompositeActivity, il più importante dei quali è che un'attività CompositeActivity non può spostare il <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Closed>se qualsiasi attività figlio si trova ancora nello stato di un <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Executing>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Canceling>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Compensating>, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Faulting>, stato.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Faulting> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Compensating> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Canceling> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Executing> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Closed>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"></xref> class from an <xref:System.Object> which implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface with type <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza del <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"> </xref> classe da un <xref:System.Object>che implementa il <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>interfaccia con il tipo <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> implementing the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface with type <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Object>che implementa il <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>interfaccia con il tipo <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"></xref> class, along with the name for that activity.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"> </xref> (classe), insieme al nome dell'attività.

trans-unit.source: The name for the instance.
trans-unit.target: Il nome per l'istanza.

trans-unit.source: name is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: nameè un riferimento null ( in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets the object representing the collection, <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection"></xref>, of all child activities.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto che rappresenta la raccolta, <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection"> </xref>, di tutte le attività figlio.

trans-unit.source: Represents the collection of child activities managed by the composite activity.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta la raccolta delle attività figlio gestita dall'attività composita.

trans-unit.source: This collection can be updated.
trans-unit.target: Questa raccolta può essere aggiornata.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection"></xref> of all child activities.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection"></xref>di tutte le attività figlio.

trans-unit.source: Applies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges"></xref> manifest in the parameter to this instance.
trans-unit.target: Si applica il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges"> </xref> manifesto nel parametro per questa istanza.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges"></xref> to apply.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges"> </xref> da applicare.

trans-unit.source: workflowChanges is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: workflowChangesè un riferimento null ( in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value which controls whether the individual activities within <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*> can be modified.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che controlla se le singole attività all'interno di <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*>può essere modificato.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the individual activities within <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*> can be modified; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se le singole attività all'interno di <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*>può essere modificata; in caso contrario <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*>

trans-unit.source: Calls <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.Dispose*> on this instance, and optionally calls <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.Dispose*> on all child activities of this instance.
trans-unit.target: Chiamate <> </> *> su questa istanza e facoltativamente chiama <> </> *> in tutte le attività figlio di questa istanza.

trans-unit.source: Throughout an activity's lifetime, several .NET objects may be created or disposed.
trans-unit.target: Per tutta la durata di un'attività, diversi oggetti .NET possono essere creati o eliminati.

trans-unit.source: Every time a workflow instance is unloaded from memory, the .NET objects corresponding to the activities in the workflow tree are disposed (the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.Dispose%2A> method is called on each activity).
trans-unit.target: Ogni volta che un'istanza del flusso di lavoro viene scaricata dalla memoria, gli oggetti .NET corrispondenti alle attività nell'albero del flusso di lavoro vengono eliminati (il <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.Dispose%2A>metodo viene chiamato su ogni attività).</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the workflow instance is loaded back into memory, a new .NET object is created for each activity with the state from the corresponding unload.
trans-unit.target: Quando l'istanza del flusso di lavoro viene caricata in memoria, viene creato un nuovo oggetto .NET per ogni attività con lo stato conseguente lo scaricamento corrispondente.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources used by this instance and all child activities of this instance; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only the unmanaged resources of this instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per rilasciare le risorse gestite e non gestite utilizzate dall'istanza e tutte le attività figlio di questa istanza; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> per rilasciare solo le risorse non gestite di questa istanza.

trans-unit.source: Gets the read-only collection that represents the subset of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*> that are enabled.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la raccolta di sola lettura che rappresenta il sottoinsieme delle <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*>che sono abilitati.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*>

trans-unit.source: The read-only collection that represents the subset of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*> that are enabled.
trans-unit.target: La raccolta di sola lettura che rappresenta il sottoinsieme di <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*>che sono abilitati.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*>

trans-unit.source: Returns an array that contains all of the currently executing instances of the specified activity.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce una matrice che contiene tutte le istanze dell'attività specificata attualmente in esecuzione.

trans-unit.source: The specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Specificato <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An array of activity instances that are currently executing.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di istanze di attività attualmente in esecuzione.

trans-unit.source: Called when an exception is raised within the context of the execution of this instance.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato quando viene generata un'eccezione all'interno del contesto di esecuzione di questa istanza.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"> </xref> per questa istanza.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception> that caused this fault.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Exception>che ha causato l'errore.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"></xref> that results from an attempt to cancel this instance.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"> </xref> risultante dal tentativo di annullamento di questa istanza.

trans-unit.source: exception is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: exceptionè un riferimento null ( in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Initializes all appropriate child activities of this instance and the specified <xref:System.IServiceProvider>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza tutte le attività figlio appropriate di questa istanza e specificata <xref:System.IServiceProvider>.</xref:System.IServiceProvider>

trans-unit.target: Specificata <xref:System.IServiceProvider>.</xref:System.IServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: provider is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: providerè un riferimento null ( in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Calls when an activity is added.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato quando viene aggiunta un'attività.

trans-unit.source: The specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Specificato <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Implementazione corrente non fornisce alcuna funzionalità.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime engine every time the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> for this activity is loaded.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato dal motore di runtime del flusso di lavoro ogni volta il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"> </xref> per questa attività viene caricata.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that implements <xref:System.IServiceProvider> and provides services to this instance.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Object>che implementa <xref:System.IServiceProvider>e fornisce servizi a questa istanza.</xref:System.IServiceProvider> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime engine every time the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> for this activity is unloaded.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato dal motore di runtime del flusso di lavoro ogni volta il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"> </xref> per questa attività viene scaricata.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that implements <xref:System.IServiceProvider> and provides services to this instance.

trans-unit.source: Performs additional processing when the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Esegue un'elaborazione aggiuntiva quando la <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*>le modifiche alle proprietà.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs"></xref> broadcast by the event.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs"> </xref> trasmesso dall'evento.

trans-unit.source: Event that occurs before a change being made to the underlying <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*>.
trans-unit.target: Evento che si verifica prima di una modifica apportata al <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*> sottostante

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.EventArgs> relating to the event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>relativi all'evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Called after changes have been made to the collection <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*> of this instance.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato dopo che sono state apportate modifiche alla raccolta <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*>di questa istanza.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities*>

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, provides processing for this event.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposto a override in una classe derivata, fornisce l'elaborazione di questo evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> associated with this instance.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"> </xref> associata a questa istanza.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime engine when an activity transitions into the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"></xref> state from the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"></xref> state.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato dal motore di runtime del flusso di lavoro quando un'attività esegue la transizione di <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"> </xref> dello stato dal <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"> </xref> stato.

trans-unit.source: This method is used for activity cleanup, such as clearing dependency properties and deleting queues.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene utilizzato per attività di pulizia, quali la cancellazione delle proprietà di dipendenza e l'eliminazione di code.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that implements <xref:System.IServiceProvider> and provides services to this instance.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Object>che implementa <xref:System.IServiceProvider>e fornisce servizi a questa istanza.</xref:System.IServiceProvider> </xref:System.Object>
